short_summary: Bid for snowplowing and ice control services for Tier 1 infrastructures.
description: The Parks Canada Agency is seeking services for snowplowing and ice control for Tier 1 infrastructures (offices, residences, etc.). The period of the contract is from the date of the contract to March 31, 2024, inclusive, with the option to extend for two additional one-year periods.
duration_in_months: Il est recommandé que le soumissionnaire ou un représentant de ce dernier visite les lieux où seront réalisés les travaux.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

**Contract Title:** Provide Tier 1 Infrastructure Snow & Ice Control - Rouge National Urban Park

**Reference Number:** CB 984-6377883

**Amendment Number:** 6

**Solicitation Number:** 5P300-23-0216/B

**Publication Date:** 06 November 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** 16 November 2023, 14:00:00

**Contracting Entity:** Parks Canada

**Service Required:** Snow removal and ice control services for Tier 1 infrastructure (offices, residences, etc.)

**Period of Contract:** From the contract date to 31 March 2024, with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods.

**Delivery Location:** Worldwide

**Optional Site Visit:** Bidders are strongly encouraged to attend a site visit at the work location on 14 November 2023, at 10:30 EDT. Bidders must notify the Contracting Authority by 10 November 2023 to confirm their attendance.

**Procurement Method:** Competitive, Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Submission Instructions:** Bids received by fax or email will be accepted as official. Bidders must submit their bid via fax or email, as indicated in the solicitation document. Bids received in person or by courier will not be accepted.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Bonnie Knott
* Email: soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca
* Phone: (709) 636-4953
* Fax: 1-877-558-2349

**Notice and Attachments:** The tender notice and attachments can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's electronic tendering service at [insert link]. Addenda, if issued, will be available from the Government of Canada's tendering service.

**Important Notice:** Bidders must ensure that their submission meets the requirements outlined in the solicitation document. Late submissions will not be accepted. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Language of Submission:** Documents may be submitted in either English or French. Parks Canada has made every effort to provide equivalent documents in both official languages; however, any discrepancies between the English and French documents should be reported to the Contracting Authority.    
**Attachments:** The tender notice includes two attachments:

* Request for Quote - 5P300-23-0216/B
* Appendix B - Tier 1 Location Maps, Final for 2023-
